title: Bop - The Amazing Adventures of One Curious Pixel (2012) FLAC 24
description:
Hailing from Saint-Petersburg in Russia, Bop is a new breed of producer intent on re-writing the rulebook with an intoxicating
 ice-cold sound; embracing influences from deep house, dub techno and IDM through to minimalist dubstep and ambient drum & bass.
 Inspired by the likes of Photek and Paradox, he has swiftly carved out a sounds of his own. On heavy rotation on the Bop home 
stereo youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re as likely to hear dub techno as you are free jazz, trip hop and even hardcore punk.
Expect the unexpected and cast aside your drum & bass aspersions; Bop is an artist light-years ahead of the game and heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s
 determined to win the symphonic space race by stretching the parameters of electronic music.
